DOC.brief_summary: This study determine whether saphenous vein [ arterial ] bypass graft leg relax response increase blood flow .
DOC.brief_title: Endothelial Function Lower Extremity Bypass Grafts
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects undergo saphenous vein [ arterial ] bypass graft femoral above-knee popliteal artery undergo ultrasound image rest , 5 minute blood pressure cuff occlusion calf . ( 1 minute 15 minute ) Subjects give sub-lingual nitroglycerin , repeat ultrasound perform 3 minute later . Following 10 minute rest , subject give intravenous L-NMMA , specific nitric oxide inhibitor , help determine responsible agent vein graft flow mediate dilation .
DOC.criteria: Adults undergone femoral artery aboveknee popliteal artery saphenous vein bypass graft Amputation beyond toe Critical limb ischemia define rest pain , nonhealing ulceration gangrene Pregnancy
